vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
εὐαγγελ-ιστής, οῦ, ὁ,
bringer of good tidings: hence, evangelist, preacher of the gospel, [NT]
__II proclaimer of oracular messages, [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
evangelist, preacher of the gospel
primarily one who announces glad tidings; an evangelist, preacher of the Gospel, teacher of the Christian religion, Acts 21:8; Eph. 4:11; 2Tim. 4:5*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: uno que predica las buenas nuevas, evangelista
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 報好消息的人, 傳道人 (徒 21:8; 弗 4:11; 提後 4:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 报好消息的人, 传道人 (徒 21:8; 弗 4:11; 提后 4:5)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: nhà truyền giảng Tin Mừng; nhà truyền giáo, người mang tin tốt lành. // εὐαγγελίζω (G2097)
